title: Impact Analysis of Patient Handover on Learning Outcomes in Medical Education

context.prior_knowledge: Basic clinical medicine knowledge and understanding of patient care processes
context.additional_context: A simulated educational environment mimicking an internal medicine practicum in five hospital settings with night-floating systems. Conducting virtual patient handover simulations using VR tools in a limited technological environment (smartphone-centric).

learning_goals: Students can identify ≥3 types of information transfer errors in patient handoffs and propose improvement strategies.
Experience ≥10 virtual patient handoff simulations and perform core diagnostic procedures for fresh patients with 80% accuracy.
Establish strategies to enhance learning outcomes by ≥15% through team-based patient handoff protocols.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
